page.title: 05Farming(2)
page.content: Mr.Clutterbuck owns Eccleswall Farm. He came to school so we could ask him some questions and he also took us on a visit to his farm. Mr.Clutterbuck has been a farmer for 15 years.He has about 300 acres of land,some of which lies in the middle of our area.On these larger fields he grows crops,mainly wheat,barley,sugar beet and peas for seed stock. He enjoys farming and likes being a farmer.He also likes animals his favourite being sheep.On his farm he has 40 cows,350 lambs and 200 ewes. Mr.Clutterbuck has lots of machinery.He has four tractors,one combine harvester,a bailer,a plough and harrows and a seed drill as well.He says the farm looks much as it did when he moved there.At one time it was all trees and forests.
